attributes.name: Keeper of Masks
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."

attributes.name: Herald of Spring
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
attributes.flavor_text:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem

attributes.name: Fae Bladetwirler
attributes.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"

attributes.name: Kinkou Lifeblade
attributes.flavor_text: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."

attributes.name: Karma
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
attributes.description_raw: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You're Enlightened.
attributes.flavor_text: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."

associated_cards.name: Karma's Insight of Ages
associated_cards.description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Karma</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
Create a Karma in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

associated_cards.name: Karma
associated_cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.

Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
When you play a spell, copy it with the same targets.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."

attributes.name: Recall
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
attributes.description_raw: Recall an ally.
attributes.flavor_text: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.

attributes.name: Zed
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
attributes.levelup_description: I've seen myself or allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadows</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice.<style=Variable></style>
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen myself or allied Living Shadows strike the enemy Nexus twice.
attributes.flavor_text: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."

associated_cards.name: Zed's Shadowshift
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zed</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
Create a Zed in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

associated_cards.name: Zed
associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats and positive keywords.
associated_cards.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats and positive keywords.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."

associated_cards.name: Living Shadow
associated_cards.flavor_text: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.

attributes.name: Greenglade Elder
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.

attributes.name: Nimble Poro
attributes.flavor_text: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand

attributes.name: Navori Conspirator
attributes.description: To play me, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
attributes.description_raw: To play me, Recall an ally.
attributes.flavor_text: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."

attributes.name: Jeweled Protector
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
attributes.flavor_text:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands

attributes.name: Sown Seeds
attributes.description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma

attributes.name: Death Mark
attributes.description: Remove <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed

attributes.name: Shadow Flare
attributes.description: Grant ALL battling followers <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.

attributes.name: Inspiring Mentor
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”

attributes.name: Dawn and Dusk
attributes.description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed

attributes.name: Scaled Snapper
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
attributes.flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

attributes.name: Shadow Assassin
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.

attributes.name: Scaled Snapper
attributes.flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

attributes.name: Scaled Snapper

attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen allies gain Barrier 5 times.
attributes.flavor_text: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."

associated_cards.name: Shen's Stand United
associated_cards.description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Create a Shen in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

associated_cards.flavor_text: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."

attributes.name: Shadow Fiend
attributes.flavor_text: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

attributes.name: Rush
attributes.description: Give an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
attributes.flavor_text: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.

attributes.name: Yone, Windchaser
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."

associated_cards.name: Staggering Strikes
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
associated_cards.description_raw: Stun 2 enemies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser

attributes.name: Staggering Strikes
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Stun 2 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser

attributes.name: Zephyr Sage
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zephyr Sage</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
attributes.flavor_text:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands

attributes.name: Greenglade Lookout
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in hand by 1.
attributes.description_raw: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in hand by 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."

attributes.name: Minah Swiftfoot
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand

associated_cards.name: Skyward Strikes
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
associated_cards.description_raw: Recall 3 enemies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand

attributes.name: Ritual of Renewal
attributes.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma

attributes.name: Stand United
attributes.description: Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

attributes.name: Ghost
attributes.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally Elusive this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed

attributes.name: Windfarer Hatchling
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands

attributes.name: Insight of Ages
attributes.description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
attributes.description_raw:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
attributes.flavor_text: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

attributes.name: Silent Shadowseer
attributes.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."

attributes.name: Cloud Drinker
attributes.description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
attributes.description_raw: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
attributes.flavor_text: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.

attributes.name: Will of Ionia
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
attributes.description_raw: Recall a unit.
attributes.flavor_text: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.

attributes.name: Skyward Strikes
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Recall 3 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand

attributes.name: Navori Bladescout
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"

attributes.name: Sparring Student
attributes.description: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"

attributes.name: Greenglade Duo
attributes.description: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"

attributes.name: Kinkou Wayfinder
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.

attributes.name: Yusari
attributes.flavor_text: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."

attributes.name: Ren Shadowblade
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”

associated_cards.name: Shadow Fiend
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

attributes.name: Emerald Awakener
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
attributes.description_raw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
attributes.flavor_text: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."

attributes.name: Health Potion
attributes.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
attributes.description_raw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
attributes.flavor_text: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.

attributes.name: Deny
attributes.description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
attributes.flavor_text: No.

attributes.name: Navori Highwayman
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
attributes.flavor_text: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”

associated_cards.name: Navori Brigand
associated_cards.flavor_text: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.

attributes.name: Navori Brigand
attributes.flavor_text: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.

attributes.name: The Empyrean
attributes.flavor_text: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General

attributes.name: Greenglade Caretaker
attributes.description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."

attributes.name: Steel Tempest
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Stun an attacking enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

attributes.name: Spirit's Refuge
attributes.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen

attributes.name: Rivershaper
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
attributes.description_raw: Strike: Draw a spell.
attributes.flavor_text: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."

attributes.name: Solitary Monk
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Recall all other allies.
attributes.flavor_text: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."

attributes.name: Shadowshift
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
attributes.description_raw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
attributes.flavor_text: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

associated_cards.name: Living Shadow
associated_cards.flavor_text: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.

attributes.name: Ki Guardian
attributes.description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
attributes.description_raw:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen

attributes.name: Draven
attributes.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've struck with 2+ total Spinning Axes.
attributes.flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

associated_cards.name: Spinning Axe
associated_cards.description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
associated_cards.description_raw:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular

associated_cards.name: Draven
associated_cards.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axes</style></link> in hand.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I'm summoned or strike: Create 2 Spinning Axes in hand.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"

associated_cards.name: Draven's Whirling Death
associated_cards.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
Create a Draven in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "I have the best job." - Draven

attributes.description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
attributes.description_raw: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran

attributes.name: Vladimir
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You've had 5+ allies survive damage.
attributes.flavor_text:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...

associated_cards.name: Vladimir's Transfusion
associated_cards.description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a Vladimir in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

associated_cards.name: Crimson Pact
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Delicious." - Vladimir

associated_cards.name: Vladimir
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Play: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."

attributes.name: Crimson Pact
attributes.description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "Delicious." - Vladimir

attributes.name: Culling Strike
attributes.description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
attributes.description_raw: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
attributes.flavor_text: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.

attributes.name: Crimson Curator
attributes.description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"

associated_cards.name: Crimson Bloodletter
associated_cards.description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
associated_cards.description_raw: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple

associated_cards.name: Crimson Pigeon
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Deal 1 to my supported ally to give me +1|+1 this round.
associated_cards.description_raw: Support: Deal 1 to my supported ally to give me +1|+1 this round.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "It's rather fun, feeding the birds. I wagered with poor Feoward that they'd sup blood as keenly as a Bordent basilisk, and lo and behold: the pigeons are Noxian indeed!" - Edvin Cortain, Crimson Curator

associated_cards.name: Crimson Aristocrat
associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
associated_cards.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and Overwhelm
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

associated_cards.name: Crimson Disciple
associated_cards.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

associated_cards.name: Crimson Awakener
associated_cards.description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

attributes.name: Darius
attributes.levelup_description: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
attributes.flavor_text: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

associated_cards.name: Darius
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

associated_cards.name: Darius' Decimate
associated_cards.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

attributes.name: Arachnoid Host
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.

attributes.name: Decisive Maneuver
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain

attributes.name: Arachnoid Sentry
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Stun an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat

associated_cards.name: Paralyzing Bite
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
associated_cards.description_raw: Stun an enemy.
associated_cards.flavor_text: It was not the kiss he had in mind.

attributes.name: Paralyzing Bite
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Stun an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: It was not the kiss he had in mind.

attributes.name: Transfusion
attributes.description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

attributes.name: Legion Saboteur
attributes.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain

associated_cards.name: Sabotage
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur

attributes.name: Darius
attributes.flavor_text: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

associated_cards.name: Darius' Decimate
associated_cards.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

associated_cards.name: Darius
associated_cards.levelup_description: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

attributes.name: Darius' Decimate
attributes.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
attributes.description_raw:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

associated_cards.name: Darius
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

associated_cards.name: Darius
associated_cards.levelup_description: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

attributes.name: House Spider
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
attributes.flavor_text: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: Crimson Disciple
attributes.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

attributes.name: Arena Battlecaster
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.

attributes.name: Legion Marauder
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allied Legion Marauders <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.

attributes.name: Crowd Favorite
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
attributes.flavor_text: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.

attributes.name: Whirling Death
attributes.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
attributes.description_raw: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "I have the best job." - Draven

attributes.name: Reckoning
attributes.description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
attributes.description_raw: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
attributes.flavor_text: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster

attributes.name: Sabotage
attributes.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur

attributes.name: Intimidating Roar
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies with 4 or less Power.
attributes.description_raw: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
attributes.flavor_text: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster

attributes.name: Decimate
attributes.description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

attributes.name: Legion Veteran
attributes.description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.

attributes.name: Shiraza the Blade
attributes.description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."

attributes.name: Katarina
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
attributes.levelup_description: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
attributes.flavor_text: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."

associated_cards.name: Blade's Edge
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to anything.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to anything.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

associated_cards.name: Katarina
associated_cards.description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link> and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand. It costs 0.
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
associated_cards.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, Rally and create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand. It costs 0.
Strike: Recall me.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard

associated_cards.name: Katarina's Death Lotus
associated_cards.description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Katarina</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a Katarina in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

attributes.name: Captain Farron
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Decimates</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.

associated_cards.name: Decimate
associated_cards.description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

attributes.name: Legion Rearguard
attributes.flavor_text: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.

attributes.name: Blade's Edge
attributes.description: Deal 1 to anything.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to anything.
attributes.flavor_text: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

attributes.name: Basilisk Rider
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
attributes.flavor_text: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.

attributes.name: Legion Grenadier
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.

attributes.name: Legion General
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
attributes.flavor_text: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.

attributes.name: Legion Drummer
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
attributes.flavor_text: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.

attributes.name: Arena Bookie
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."

attributes.name: Vision
attributes.description: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain

attributes.name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker
attributes.flavor_text: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius

attributes.name: Minotaur Reckoner
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."

attributes.name: Battering Ram
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +4|+0.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."

attributes.name: Affectionate Poro
attributes.flavor_text: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius

attributes.name: Crimson Aristocrat
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
attributes.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and Overwhelm
attributes.flavor_text: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

attributes.name: Trifarian Hopeful
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
attributes.flavor_text: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran

attributes.name: Might
attributes.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius

attributes.name: Precious Pet
attributes.flavor_text: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.

attributes.name: Death Lotus
attributes.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.flavor_text: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

attributes.name: Shunpo
attributes.description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
attributes.flavor_text: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.

attributes.name: Trifarian Assessor
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
attributes.flavor_text: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General

attributes.name: Blood for Blood
attributes.description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.

attributes.name: Savage Reckoner
attributes.flavor_text: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie

attributes.name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
attributes.flavor_text: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.

attributes.name: Draven's Biggest Fan
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
attributes.flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"

associated_cards.name: Draven
associated_cards.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've struck with 2+ total Spinning Axes.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

attributes.name: Reckless Trifarian
attributes.flavor_text: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain

attributes.name: Elixir of Wrath
attributes.description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom

attributes.name: Noxian Guillotine
attributes.description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.

attributes.name: Crimson Awakener
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
attributes.flavor_text: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

attributes.name: Kato The Arm
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."

attributes.name: Guile
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Stun an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc

attributes.name: Dawnspeakers
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
attributes.description_raw: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

attributes.name: Lucian
attributes.levelup_description: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.<style=Variable></style>
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
attributes.flavor_text: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

associated_cards.name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
associated_cards.description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

associated_cards.name: Lucian
associated_cards.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

associated_cards.name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
associated_cards.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

associated_cards.name: Senna
associated_cards.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
associated_cards.levelup_description: I've seen you kill 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.<style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've seen you kill 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."

attributes.name: Avalanche
attributes.description: Deal 2 to ALL units.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 2 to ALL units.
attributes.flavor_text: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.

attributes.name: Mobilize
attributes.description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
attributes.description_raw: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

attributes.name: Lux
attributes.levelup_description: I've seen you play 6+ mana of spells.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen you play 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"

associated_cards.name: Lux
associated_cards.description: Each time you play 6+ mana of spells, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand. <style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.description_raw: Each time you play 6+ mana of spells, create a Final Spark in hand.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "No more holding back!"

associated_cards.name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier
associated_cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lux</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Create a Lux in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

associated_cards.name: Final Spark
associated_cards.description: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux

attributes.name: Swiftwing Lancer
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

attributes.name: Vanguard Defender
attributes.flavor_text: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

attributes.name: Battlesmith
attributes.description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: Wars are won in the forge.

attributes.name: Tianna Crownguard
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
attributes.flavor_text: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

attributes.name: Garen
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've struck twice.
attributes.flavor_text: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

associated_cards.name: Garen
associated_cards.description:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
Round Start: Rally.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”

associated_cards.name: Garen's Judgment
associated_cards.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Garen</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
Create a Garen in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Justice always comes full circle.

attributes.name: Garen
attributes.description:

attributes.name: Stand Alone
attributes.description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
attributes.description_raw: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
attributes.flavor_text: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

attributes.name: Fiora
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've killed 2 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

associated_cards.name: Fiora
associated_cards.description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.description_raw: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "... and now I know."

associated_cards.name: Fiora's Riposte
associated_cards.description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Create a Fiora in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

attributes.name: Brightsteel Formation
attributes.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

attributes.name: Relentless Pursuit
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Rally.
attributes.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

attributes.name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
attributes.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
attributes.description_raw:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

associated_cards.name: Lucian
associated_cards.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

associated_cards.name: Lucian
associated_cards.levelup_description: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.<style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

attributes.name: T-Hex
attributes.flavor_text:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8

attributes.name: Lucian
attributes.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
attributes.flavor_text: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

associated_cards.description_raw:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

attributes.name: Detain
attributes.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
attributes.description_raw: An ally Captures a unit.
attributes.flavor_text: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

attributes.name: Judgment
attributes.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
attributes.description_raw: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: Justice always comes full circle.

attributes.name: Laurent Duelist
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> to an ally in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant Challenger to an ally in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign

attributes.name: Mageseeker Inciter
attributes.description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.description_raw: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.flavor_text: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

attributes.name: Vanguard Bannerman
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

attributes.name: War Chefs
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

attributes.name: Plucky Poro
attributes.flavor_text: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

attributes.name: Laurent Chevalier
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another random <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
attributes.description_raw: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
attributes.flavor_text: "...Good grief." - Fiora

attributes.name: Remembrance
attributes.description: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
attributes.description_raw: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
attributes.flavor_text: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

attributes.name: Fiora
attributes.description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
attributes.flavor_text: "... and now I know."
