associated_cards.description_raw: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "... and now I know."

attributes.name: Redoubled Valor
attributes.description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
attributes.description_raw: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
attributes.flavor_text: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

attributes.name: Mageseeker Conservator
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook

attributes.name: Silverwing Vanguard
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of me.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Summon an exact copy of me.
attributes.flavor_text: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

attributes.name: Laurent Protege
attributes.flavor_text: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

attributes.name: Succession
attributes.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
attributes.flavor_text: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

associated_cards.name: Dauntless Vanguard
associated_cards.flavor_text: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

attributes.name: Vanguard Lookout
attributes.flavor_text: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

attributes.name: Purify
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
attributes.description_raw: Silence a follower.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook

attributes.name: Dauntless Vanguard
attributes.flavor_text: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

attributes.name: Mageseeker Persuader
attributes.description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.description_raw: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.flavor_text: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

attributes.name: Vanguard Squire
attributes.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

attributes.name: Riposte
attributes.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

attributes.name: Reinforcements
attributes.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code

associated_cards.name: Dauntless Vanguard
associated_cards.flavor_text: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

attributes.name: Radiant Guardian
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign

attributes.name: Laurent Bladekeeper
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
attributes.flavor_text: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

attributes.name: Single Combat
attributes.description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
attributes.description_raw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
attributes.flavor_text: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

attributes.name: Prismatic Barrier
attributes.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

attributes.name: En Garde
attributes.description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give all allies Challenger this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

attributes.name: Vanguard Sergeant
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign

associated_cards.name: For Demacia!
associated_cards.description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
associated_cards.description_raw: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
associated_cards.flavor_text: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

attributes.name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
attributes.description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
attributes.flavor_text: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

associated_cards.name: Lucian
associated_cards.levelup_description: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.<style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

attributes.name: Back to Back
attributes.description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

attributes.name: For Demacia!
attributes.description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

attributes.name: Radiant Strike
attributes.description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

attributes.name: Brightsteel Protector
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

attributes.name: Cithria of Cloudfield
attributes.flavor_text: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

attributes.name: Vanguard Firstblade
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
attributes.flavor_text: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

attributes.name: Fleetfeather Tracker
attributes.description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
attributes.flavor_text: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

attributes.name: Vanguard Cavalry
attributes.flavor_text: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

attributes.name: Chain Vest
attributes.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Grant an ally Tough.
attributes.flavor_text: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

attributes.name: Mageseeker Investigator
attributes.description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.description_raw: Create a Detain in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.flavor_text: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

associated_cards.name: Detain
associated_cards.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
associated_cards.description_raw: An ally Captures a unit.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

attributes.name: Cithria the Bold
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

attributes.name: Vanguard Redeemer
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

attributes.name: Silverwing Diver
attributes.flavor_text: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

attributes.name: Jinx
attributes.levelup_description: I see your hand is empty.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I see your hand is empty.
attributes.flavor_text:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"

associated_cards.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
associated_cards.description: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus and 1 to all enemies.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus and 1 to all enemies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "See ya!" - Jinx

associated_cards.name: Jinx
associated_cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time I level up or you empty your hand, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Super Mega Death Rocket!</style></link> in hand.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Round Start: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time I level up or you empty your hand, create a Super Mega Death Rocket! in hand.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"

associated_cards.name: Jinx's Get Excited!
associated_cards.description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jinx</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a Jinx in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

attributes.description:

attributes.name: Teemo
attributes.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
attributes.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You've planted 15+ Poison Puffcaps.
attributes.flavor_text: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

associated_cards.name: Poison Puffcap
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

associated_cards.name: Teemo
associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Double the <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck (plants 5 minimum).
associated_cards.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Double the Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck (plants 5 minimum).
associated_cards.flavor_text: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"

associated_cards.name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud
associated_cards.description:
Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Teemo</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
Create a Teemo in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

attributes.name: Teemo
attributes.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Double the <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck (plants 5 minimum).

attributes.name: Heimerdinger
attributes.description: When you play a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
attributes.description_raw: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
attributes.levelup_description: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.<style=Variable></style>
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.
attributes.flavor_text: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"

associated_cards.name: Heimerdinger
associated_cards.description: When you play a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
associated_cards.description_raw: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "PROGRESSSSS!"

associated_cards.name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
associated_cards.description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

associated_cards.name: Mk0: Windup Shredder
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface

associated_cards.name: Mk1: Wrenchbot
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1

associated_cards.name: Mk2: Evolution Turret
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2

associated_cards.name: Mk3: Apex Turret
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3

associated_cards.name: Mk4: Stormlobber
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4

associated_cards.name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5

associated_cards.name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6

associated_cards.name: Mk7: Armored Stomper
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7

associated_cards.name: T-Hex
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8

attributes.name: Ravenous Butcher
attributes.description: To play me, kill an ally.
attributes.description_raw: To play me, kill an ally.
attributes.flavor_text: You are what you eat.

attributes.name: Augmented Experimenter
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.

associated_cards.name: Reckless Research
associated_cards.description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
associated_cards.description_raw: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Progress, whatever the price.

attributes.name: Parade Electrorig
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.

associated_cards.levelup_description: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.<style=Variable></style>
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"

attributes.name: Mk2: Evolution Turret
attributes.flavor_text:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2

attributes.name: Mk4: Stormlobber
attributes.flavor_text:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4

attributes.name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
attributes.description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> in your deck.
attributes.description_raw:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

associated_cards.name: Heimerdinger

associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.

associated_cards.description_raw: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "PROGRESSSSS!"

attributes.name: Mk3: Apex Turret
attributes.flavor_text:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3

attributes.name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster
attributes.flavor_text:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5

attributes.name: Mk7: Armored Stomper
attributes.flavor_text:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7

attributes.name: Mk0: Windup Shredder
attributes.flavor_text:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface

attributes.name: Mk1: Wrenchbot
attributes.flavor_text:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1

attributes.name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone
attributes.flavor_text:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6

attributes.name: Academy Prodigy
attributes.flavor_text: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.

attributes.name: Eager Apprentice
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
attributes.flavor_text: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.

attributes.name: Puffcap Peddler
attributes.description: When you play a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
attributes.description_raw: When you play a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
attributes.flavor_text:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"

associated_cards.name: Poison Puffcap
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

attributes.name: Corina Veraza
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
attributes.flavor_text: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."

associated_cards.name: Magnum Opus
associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
associated_cards.description_raw: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza

associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: You've planted 15+ Poison Puffcaps.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

attributes.name: Jury-Rig
attributes.description: When played or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When played or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
attributes.flavor_text: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.

associated_cards.name: Scrap Scuttler
associated_cards.flavor_text: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!

attributes.name: Rising Spell Force
attributes.description: Give an ally +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal

"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."

attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
attributes.flavor_text: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."

associated_cards.name: Caustic Cask

associated_cards.description_raw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman

attributes.flavor_text: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.

attributes.name: Jae Medarda
attributes.description: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.

attributes.name: Mushroom Cloud
attributes.description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
attributes.description_raw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
attributes.flavor_text: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

associated_cards.name: Poison Puffcap
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

attributes.name: Zaunite Urchin
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"

attributes.name: Reckless Research
attributes.description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: Progress, whatever the price.

attributes.name: Back Alley Barkeep
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link> you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
attributes.flavor_text: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."

attributes.name: Trueshot Barrage
attributes.description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
attributes.flavor_text: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal

attributes.name: Daring Poro
attributes.flavor_text: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.

attributes.name: Counterfeit Copies
attributes.description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
attributes.description_raw: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.

attributes.name: Mystic Shot
attributes.description: Deal 2 to anything.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 2 to anything.
attributes.flavor_text: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

attributes.name: Purrsuit of Perfection
attributes.description: If you've played <style=Variable>20</style> new cards this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: If you've played 20 new cards this game, summon Catastrophe.
attributes.flavor_text: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer

associated_cards.name: Catastrophe
associated_cards.flavor_text: Your end is MEOW.

attributes.name: Catastrophe
attributes.flavor_text: Your end is MEOW.

attributes.name: Hextech Transmogulator
attributes.description: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
attributes.description_raw: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
attributes.flavor_text:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"

attributes.name: Midenstokke Henchmen
attributes.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of me.
attributes.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."

attributes.name: Statikk Shock
attributes.description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
attributes.description_raw:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger

attributes.name: Golden Crushbot
attributes.flavor_text: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.

attributes.name: Rummage
attributes.description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
attributes.description_raw: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
attributes.flavor_text: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx

attributes.name: Scrapdash Assembly
attributes.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttlers</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 2 Scrap Scuttlers.
attributes.flavor_text: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.

associated_cards.name: Scrap Scuttler
associated_cards.flavor_text: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!

attributes.name: Thermogenic Beam
attributes.description:
To play, spend all your mana.
<style=Variable>Deal that much to a unit.</style>
attributes.description_raw:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
attributes.flavor_text: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter

attributes.name: Astute Academic
attributes.description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.

attributes.name: Unlicensed Innovation
attributes.description: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Illegal Contraption</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon an Illegal Contraption.
attributes.flavor_text: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist

associated_cards.name: Illegal Contraption
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections

attributes.name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Map</style></link> in hand. It costs 0 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Create a Sumpworks Map in hand. It costs 0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.

associated_cards.name: Sumpworks Map
associated_cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: Grant an ally Elusive.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

attributes.name: Illegal Contraption
attributes.flavor_text: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections

attributes.flavor_text: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan project engineer

associated_cards.flavor_text: Your end is MEOW.

attributes.name: Assembly Bot
attributes.description: When you play a spell, grant me +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When you play a spell, grant me +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick

attributes.name: Chempunk Shredder
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper

associated_cards.name: Face-Melter
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder

attributes.name: Eminent Benefactor
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a random Epic card from your regions.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Manifest a random Epic card from your regions.
attributes.flavor_text: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."

attributes.name: Funsmith
attributes.description: All of your spells and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> deal 1 extra damage.
attributes.description_raw: All of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
attributes.flavor_text: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"

attributes.name: Face-Melter
attributes.description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder

attributes.name: Professor von Yipp
attributes.description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
attributes.flavor_text: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."

attributes.name: Unstable Voltician
attributes.description: Grant me +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.description_raw: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
attributes.flavor_text: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.

attributes.name: Progress Day!
attributes.description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
attributes.description_raw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
attributes.flavor_text:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

attributes.name: Plaza Guardian
attributes.description: I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
attributes.description_raw: I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
attributes.flavor_text: You have twenty seconds to comply.

attributes.name: Clump of Whumps
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler

associated_cards.name: Mushroom Cloud
associated_cards.description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
associated_cards.description_raw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

associated_cards.name: Poison Puffcap
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

attributes.name: Flame Chompers!
attributes.description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm discarded, summon me.
attributes.flavor_text: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx

attributes.name: Get Excited!
attributes.description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
attributes.description_raw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
attributes.flavor_text: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

attributes.name: Flash of Brilliance
attributes.description:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
attributes.description_raw:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
attributes.flavor_text: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.

attributes.name: Chump Whump
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Clouds</style></link> in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler

associated_cards.name: Poison Puffcap
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

associated_cards.name: Mushroom Cloud
associated_cards.description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
associated_cards.description_raw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

attributes.name: Amateur Aeronaut
attributes.flavor_text: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer

attributes.name: Intrepid Mariner
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
attributes.flavor_text: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.

attributes.name: Sumpworks Map
attributes.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Grant an ally Elusive.
attributes.flavor_text: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

attributes.name: Chempunk Pickpocket
attributes.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy deck.
attributes.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy deck.
attributes.flavor_text: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.

attributes.name: Caustic Cask
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman

attributes.name: Anivia
attributes.description:
<link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You're Enlightened.
attributes.flavor_text: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."

associated_cards.name: Eggnivia
associated_cards.levelup_description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you're <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>, transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> and Level Up.
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: Round Start: If you're Enlightened, transform me back into Anivia and Level Up.
associated_cards.flavor_text: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.

associated_cards.name: Anivia
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Attack: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."

associated_cards.name: Glacial Storm
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
associated_cards.flavor_text: The storm that comes before the calm.

associated_cards.name: Anivia's Harsh Winds
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Frostbite 2 enemies.
Create an Anivia in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

attributes.name: Glacial Storm
attributes.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: The storm that comes before the calm.

attributes.name: Tryndamere
attributes.levelup_description: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
attributes.flavor_text: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."

associated_cards.name: Tryndamere
associated_cards.flavor_text: "...And make THEM die for it."

associated_cards.name: Tryndamere's Battle Fury
associated_cards.description:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tryndamere</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Create a Tryndamere in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

attributes.name: Iceborn Legacy
attributes.description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
attributes.description_raw: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
attributes.flavor_text: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian

attributes.name: Omen Hawk
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen

attributes.name: Harsh Winds
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Frostbite 2 enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

attributes.name: Braum
attributes.description: The first time I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've survived 10+ total damage.
attributes.flavor_text:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

associated_cards.name: Mighty Poro
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

associated_cards.name: Braum's Take Heart
associated_cards.description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a Braum in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

associated_cards.name: Braum
associated_cards.description: When I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder

attributes.name: Rimefang Wolf
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
attributes.description_raw: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
attributes.flavor_text: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.

attributes.name: Avarosan Marksman
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.

associated_cards.name: Bullseye
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to an enemy.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Gotcha.

attributes.name: Scarthane Steffen
attributes.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."

attributes.name: Lonely Poro
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder

attributes.name: Jubilant Poro
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder

attributes.name: Shatter
attributes.description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> it.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
attributes.flavor_text: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen

attributes.name: Ashe
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
attributes.levelup_description: You've reduced the Power of 5+ enemies to 0.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crystal Arrow</style></link> on top of deck.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You've reduced the Power of 5+ enemies to 0. When I level up, create a Crystal Arrow on top of deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."

associated_cards.name: Ashe
associated_cards.description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"

associated_cards.name: Ashe's Flash Freeze
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ashe</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Create an Ashe in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

associated_cards.name: Crystal Arrow
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
associated_cards.description_raw: Frostbite an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe

attributes.name: Entreat
attributes.description: Draw a champion.
attributes.description_raw: Draw a champion.
attributes.flavor_text: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry

attributes.name: Unscarred Reaver
attributes.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna

attributes.name: Enraged Yeti
attributes.flavor_text: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

attributes.name: Yeti Yearling
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yetis</style></link> in your deck.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Create 2 Enraged Yetis in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper

associated_cards.name: Enraged Yeti
associated_cards.flavor_text: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

attributes.name: Stalking Wolf
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Snow Hare</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a Snow Hare.
attributes.flavor_text:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb

associated_cards.name: Snow Hare
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb

attributes.name: Avarosan Outriders
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
attributes.flavor_text: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.

attributes.name: Braum
attributes.description: When I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
attributes.flavor_text: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder

associated_cards.name: Braum's Take Heart
associated_cards.description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a Braum in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

associated_cards.name: Braum
associated_cards.description: The first time I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
associated_cards.levelup_description_raw: I've survived 10+ total damage.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

associated_cards.name: Mighty Poro
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

attributes.name: Braum's Take Heart
attributes.description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> in your deck.

Create a Braum in your deck.
attributes.flavor_text:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

associated_cards.name: Braum
associated_cards.description: When I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder

attributes.name: Alpha Wildclaw
attributes.flavor_text: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.

attributes.name: Brittle Steel
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy with 3 or less Health.
attributes.description_raw: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
attributes.flavor_text: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum

attributes.name: Scarmother Vrynna
attributes.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”

attributes.name: Icevale Archer
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.

attributes.name: Winter's Breath
attributes.description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
attributes.description_raw: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
attributes.flavor_text: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.

attributes.name: Avarosan Hearthguard
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."

attributes.name: Poro Herder
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Poro.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you Behold a Poro.
attributes.flavor_text: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.

attributes.name: Scarmaiden Reaver
attributes.flavor_text: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"

attributes.name: Tarkaz the Tribeless
attributes.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.flavor_text: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere

associated_cards.name: Tarkaz's Fury
associated_cards.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere

attributes.name: Tarkaz's Fury
attributes.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
attributes.flavor_text: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere

attributes.name: Heart of the Fluft
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Combine your Poro followers into a <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Fluft of Poros</style></link>, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Combine your Poro followers into a Fluft of Poros, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
attributes.flavor_text:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

associated_cards.name: Fluft of Poros
associated_cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Heart of the Fluft</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"

attributes.name: Snow Hare
attributes.flavor_text:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb

attributes.name: Wyrding Stones
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
attributes.description_raw: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe

attributes.name: Kindly Tavernkeeper
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
attributes.flavor_text: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"

attributes.name: She Who Wanders
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
attributes.flavor_text: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer

associated_cards.name: Balesight
associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
associated_cards.description_raw: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
associated_cards.flavor_text: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer

attributes.name: Balesight
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
attributes.description_raw: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
attributes.flavor_text: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer

attributes.name: Poro Snax
attributes.description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker

attributes.name: Battle Fury
attributes.description: Grant an ally +8|+4.
attributes.description_raw: Grant an ally +8|+4.
attributes.flavor_text: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

attributes.name: Warmother's Call
attributes.description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
attributes.flavor_text: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.

attributes.name: Feral Mystic
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
attributes.description_raw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
attributes.flavor_text: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia

attributes.name: Icy Yeti
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Health.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
attributes.flavor_text: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer

attributes.name: Bull Elnuk
attributes.flavor_text: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.

attributes.name: Pack Mentality
attributes.description: Give all allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give all allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
attributes.flavor_text: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.

attributes.name: Elixir of Iron
attributes.description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
attributes.description_raw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper

attributes.name: Avarosan Trapper
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."

associated_cards.name: Enraged Yeti
associated_cards.flavor_text: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

attributes.name: Troop of Elnuks
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and place the rest into your deck.
attributes.description_raw: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and place the rest into your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna

attributes.name: Take Heart
attributes.description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
attributes.description_raw: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
attributes.flavor_text:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

attributes.name: Catalyst of Aeons
attributes.description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
attributes.description_raw: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
attributes.flavor_text: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.

attributes.name: Rimetusk Shaman
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Round Start: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."

attributes.name: Ancient Yeti
attributes.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Reduce my cost by 1.
attributes.description_raw: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer

attributes.name: Bullseye
attributes.description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: Gotcha.

attributes.name: Mighty Poro
attributes.flavor_text: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

attributes.name: Bloodsworn Pledge
attributes.description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
attributes.description_raw: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
attributes.flavor_text: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere

attributes.name: Flash Freeze
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
attributes.description_raw: Frostbite an enemy.
attributes.flavor_text: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

attributes.name: Fluft of Poros
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Heart of the Fluft</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
attributes.flavor_text:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"
