associated_cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Combine your Poro followers into a <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Fluft of Poros</style></link>, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
associated_cards.description_raw: Play: Combine your Poro followers into a Fluft of Poros, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
associated_cards.flavor_text:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

attributes.name: Starlit Seer
attributes.description: When you play a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When you play a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."

attributes.name: Tall Tales
attributes.description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
attributes.description_raw: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
attributes.flavor_text: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger

associated_cards.name: Enraged Yeti
associated_cards.flavor_text: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

attributes.name: They Who Endure
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
attributes.flavor_text: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper

attributes.name: Babbling Bjerg
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
attributes.flavor_text: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"

attributes.name: Avarosan Sentry
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Draw 1.
attributes.flavor_text: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."

attributes.name: Phantom Prankster
attributes.description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.description_raw: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
attributes.flavor_text: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.

attributes.name: Glimpse Beyond
attributes.description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
attributes.description_raw: Kill an ally to draw 2.
attributes.flavor_text: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

attributes.name: Elise
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: Round Start: You have 3+ other Spiders.
attributes.flavor_text: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.

associated_cards.name: Spider Queen Elise
associated_cards.description: Other Spider allies have <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw: Other Spider allies have Challenger and Fearsome.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.

associated_cards.name: Elise's Crawling Sensation
associated_cards.description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Elise</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
Create an Elise in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: Ancient Crocolith
attributes.description: To play me, kill 2 allies.
attributes.description_raw: To play me, kill 2 allies.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."

attributes.name: Soul Shepherd
attributes.description: When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+1.
attributes.description_raw: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
attributes.flavor_text: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.

attributes.name: Onslaught of Shadows
attributes.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
attributes.flavor_text: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

associated_cards.name: Spectral Rider
associated_cards.flavor_text: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.

attributes.name: Hecarim
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
attributes.levelup_description_raw: You've attacked with 7+ Ephemeral allies.
attributes.flavor_text: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.

associated_cards.name: Hecarim
associated_cards.description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "<link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> allies have +3|+0".
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
associated_cards.description_raw:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "Ephemeral allies have +3|+0".
Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.

associated_cards.name: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows

attributes.name: Fresh Offerings
attributes.description:
If 3+ allies have died this round, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>.
<style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
attributes.flavor_text: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise

associated_cards.name: Vilemaw
associated_cards.description: Other <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> allies have +1|+0.
associated_cards.description_raw: Other Fearsome allies have +1|+0.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise

attributes.name: Vilemaw
attributes.description: Other <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> allies have +1|+0.

attributes.name: Cursed Keeper
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Escaped Abomination</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
attributes.flavor_text: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.

associated_cards.name: Escaped Abomination
associated_cards.flavor_text: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.

attributes.name: Scribe of Sorrows
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
attributes.flavor_text: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"

attributes.name: Kalista
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen 3+ allies die.
attributes.flavor_text: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.

associated_cards.name: Kalista
associated_cards.description: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
associated_cards.description_raw: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the strongest dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "The wronged shall have their vengeance!"

associated_cards.name: Kalista's Black Spear
associated_cards.description:
If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kalista</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Kalista in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

attributes.name: Rhasa the Sunderer
attributes.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Kill the 2 weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

associated_cards.name: Night Harvest
associated_cards.description: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
associated_cards.description_raw: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Thin the herd.

attributes.name: Spectral Rider
attributes.flavor_text: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.

attributes.name: Scuttlegeist
attributes.description: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this game.
attributes.description_raw: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this game.
attributes.flavor_text: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.

attributes.name: Sinister Poro
attributes.flavor_text: I mean, there are worse ways to die.

attributes.name: Escaped Abomination
attributes.flavor_text: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.

attributes.name: Thresh
attributes.levelup_description_raw: I've seen 6+ units die.
attributes.flavor_text:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

associated_cards.name: Thresh
associated_cards.description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
associated_cards.description_raw: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...

associated_cards.name: Thresh's The Box
associated_cards.description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Thresh</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a Thresh in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

attributes.name: The Box
attributes.description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

attributes.name: Commander Ledros
attributes.description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
attributes.description_raw:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
attributes.flavor_text: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

associated_cards.name: Blade of Ledros
associated_cards.description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
associated_cards.description_raw: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.

attributes.name: The Harrowing
attributes.description: Revive the 6 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> allies that died this game and grant them <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Revive the 6 strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.

attributes.name: The Undying
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
attributes.flavor_text: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...

attributes.name: Absorb Soul
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 4 from an ally.
attributes.description_raw: Drain 4 from an ally.
attributes.flavor_text: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh

attributes.name: Crawling Sensation
attributes.description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
attributes.flavor_text: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: Tortured Prodigy
attributes.description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
attributes.description_raw: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
attributes.flavor_text: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.

attributes.name: Oblivious Islander
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and reduce its cost by 1.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
attributes.flavor_text: Oh, the poor lad...

Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

associated_cards.description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Thresh</style></link> in your deck.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a Thresh in your deck.
associated_cards.flavor_text: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

attributes.name: Iron Harbinger
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally you have.
attributes.description_raw: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
attributes.flavor_text: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.

attributes.name: Black Spear
attributes.description: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
attributes.description_raw: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
attributes.flavor_text: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

attributes.name: Hapless Aristocrat
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
attributes.flavor_text: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: Stirred Spirits
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.

attributes.name: Haunted Relic
attributes.description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
attributes.flavor_text: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.

associated_cards.name: Unleashed Spirit
associated_cards.flavor_text: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.

attributes.name: Unleashed Spirit
attributes.flavor_text: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.

attributes.name: Frenzied Skitterer
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise

attributes.name: Vengeance
attributes.description: Kill a unit.
attributes.description_raw: Kill a unit.
attributes.flavor_text: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.

attributes.name: Mistwraith
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied <link=card.mist><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraiths</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

attributes.name: Mark of the Isles
attributes.description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: Power, but at what cost?

attributes.name: Possession
attributes.description: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
attributes.description_raw: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
attributes.flavor_text: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.

attributes.name: Blade of Ledros
attributes.description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
attributes.description_raw: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
attributes.flavor_text: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.

associated_cards.name: Commander Ledros
associated_cards.description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
associated_cards.description_raw:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
associated_cards.flavor_text: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

attributes.name: Splinter Soul
attributes.description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and 1|1.
attributes.description_raw: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
attributes.flavor_text: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

attributes.name: Atrocity
attributes.description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
attributes.description_raw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
attributes.flavor_text: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.

attributes.name: Mist's Call
attributes.description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
attributes.description_raw: Revive a random ally that died this round.
attributes.flavor_text: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

attributes.name: Brood Awakening
attributes.description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
attributes.description_raw: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
attributes.flavor_text: They're hungriest when they hatch.

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: Wraithcaller
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
attributes.flavor_text: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.

associated_cards.name: Mistwraith
associated_cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied <link=card.mist><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraiths</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
associated_cards.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
associated_cards.flavor_text: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

attributes.name: Shark Chariot
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: The next time an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally attacks, revive me attacking.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
attributes.flavor_text: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon

attributes.name: Chronicler of Ruin
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
attributes.flavor_text: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.

attributes.name: Ethereal Remitter
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
attributes.flavor_text: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!

attributes.name: Grasp of the Undying
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 3 from any unit.
attributes.description_raw: Drain 3 from any unit.
attributes.flavor_text: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.

attributes.name: Spectral Matron
attributes.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
attributes.flavor_text: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.

attributes.name: Arachnoid Horror
attributes.flavor_text: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.

attributes.name: The Rekindler
attributes.description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
attributes.description_raw: When I'm summoned, revive the strongest dead allied champion.
attributes.flavor_text: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?

attributes.name: Withering Wail
attributes.description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
attributes.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
attributes.flavor_text: That which kills us makes them stronger.

attributes.name: Darkwater Scourge
attributes.flavor_text: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.

attributes.name: Warden's Prey
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand another random <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> follower that costs 3 or less.
attributes.description_raw: Last Breath: Create in hand another random Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
attributes.flavor_text: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…

attributes.name: Vile Feast
attributes.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
attributes.description_raw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
attributes.flavor_text: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

associated_cards.name: Spiderling
associated_cards.flavor_text: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

attributes.name: The Ruination
attributes.description: Kill ALL units.
attributes.description_raw: Kill ALL units.
attributes.flavor_text: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.

attributes.name: Soulgorger
attributes.flavor_text: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

attributes.name: Fading Memories
attributes.description: Pick a follower. Create an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it in hand.
attributes.description_raw: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
attributes.flavor_text: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.
